com.gwtext.client.widgets.form
Class Field

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.gwtext.client.widgets.BaseExtWidget
              com.gwtext.client.widgets.Component
                  com.gwtext.client.widgets.BoxComponent
                      com.gwtext.client.widgets.form.Field
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checkbox, HtmlEditor, TextField
public abstract class Field
extends BoxComponent

Base class for form fields that provides default event handling, sizing, value handling and other functionality.

setRawValue

public void setRawValue(java.lang.String value)
Sets the underlying DOM field's value directly, bypassing validation. To set the value with validation use setValue(String).

Parameters:
value - field value

setValue

public void setValue(java.lang.String value)
Sets a data value into the field and validates it. To set the value directly without validation see setRawValue(String).

Parameters:
value - the field value

public boolean validate()
